Workflow.Name: Expense: Validate and set QR User
Workflow.Description: Will validate that the last modified by user is NOT the EA user on the parent assignment. Workflow will update the record once to ensure the last Modified is the current user. If validation passes the workflow will update the QR user.

LocalizedName.description: Expense: Validate and set QR User

Description.description: Will validate that the last modified by user is NOT the EA user on the parent assignment. Workflow will update the record once to ensure the last Modified is the current user. If validation passes the workflow will update the QR user.

label.description: The Qualified Receiver cannot be the same as the Expense Authority. You cannot approve this expense
